name: kr.iamport.cordova.example
description: A sample Apache Cordova application that responds to the deviceready event.

scripts.install-iamport: npm run install-android; npm run install-ios; npm run install-plugin
scripts.uninstall-iamport: npm run uninstall-android; npm run uninstall-ios; npm run uninstall-plugin

author: Apache Cordova Team
